title: Holo
You suddenly appear, in the darkness, feeling like waking up. But a comfortable bed, a painful headache and sore throat makes you want to sleep some more. You:

equipment: Open your eyes and welcome the morning

You rub your eyes as you yawn, not feeling completeley sure you made the right decision.
    As you lift your head, you hear a crowd closing up, revolving around you.
    The light of your window becomes the scorching sun of the middle of the day.
    The confortable bed becomes a bunch of pointy hay.
    And as you rise new smells strike your nose.
    Oh... is that horse shit?

You welcome the darkness and tighten your eyes, letting yourself become one with the void.
      But suddenly, you have trouble breathing.
      Your heart rate intensifies and feel a crushing weight on you throat.
      You open your eyes to give one more look to the world around you, as it disappears...
      You leave this world, with nothing but a pale look.
